title: Medicinal Herb Classifier
description: Developed a Medicinal Herb Classifier that secured 9th place in the Smart India Hackathon 2023
body: Developed a Medicinal Herb Classifier for the Smart India Hackathon 2023, securing 9th place among 200+ teams. Built a precise herb identification system using TensorFlow and created a user-friendly interface with Streamlit. Integrated an AI chatbot for real-time herb information.

title: Project Procrastinate - Student Resources Manager
description: Developed a comprehensive student support tool with personalized profiles, customizable courses, AI chatbot assistance, Coursera recommendations, and secure uploads.
body: Developed a comprehensive student support tool with personalized profile pages, customizable course management, and secure material uploads, integrating advanced learning assistance features like an AI chatbot for academic-related queries, a Coursera course recommender, and a robust authentication system.

title: Disk Management System using Python
description: Created a Disk Management System using Python and Tkinter for file organization and real-time disk space analysis.
body: Securing 2nd runner-up in the ‘Tally Code Brewers 2023’ hackathon, I developed a fully functional Disk Management System using Python for backend and Tkinter for front-end. The system focused on efficient file organization, real-time disk space analysis, and a user-friendly graphical interface, showcasing advanced skills in both backend and UI development.

title: Traveling Salesman Problem Solver
description: This app features three parallel computing implementations of the Traveling Salesman Problem (TSP) using OpenMP, MPI, and CUDA, each showcasing distinct approaches to efficient problem-solving.
body: This repository presents three distinct implementations of the Traveling Salesman Problem (TSP) using parallel computing techniques: OpenMP for shared-memory parallelism, MPI for distributed-memory systems, and CUDA for GPU acceleration. Each implementation explores efficient solutions to the TSP, a critical problem in logistics, manufacturing, and genetics, demonstrating the impact of parallelization in enhancing computational efficiency for complex real-world applications.
